title: About
text:
(old website)

This site is devoted to the R programming, Python, Statistics and Data Science community at Harper Adams University. We meet Wednesdays at 4pm UK time on Teams and via our Slack workspace anytime.
HARUG! is the Harper Adams R User Group:

Research methods in statistics and AI applications
Build data analysis skills and capacity
Group problem solving, live coding
Tutorials and resource sharing
Community

This group is supported by the research and teaching community at Harper Adams University and by students and alumnists of the MSc in Data Science for Global Agriculture, Food, and Environment, and is led by Ed Harris.

section: Quarto: an easier way for modern markdown…?
text:
Quarto: an easier way for modern markdown…?
Ed will expound upon the virtues of Quarto and do some live coding of setting up a new Quarto website using Github pages…
Quarto website
REALLY excellent documentation

section: Using R and python in Quarto
text:
Using R and python in Quarto

# Python in Quarto
print('hello world')

hello world



# R in Quarto
print("hello world")

[1] "hello world"

section: You can render and use R and python in Quarto
text:
You can render and use R and python in Quarto

# Python in Quarto
print('hello world')

hello world



# R in Quarto
print("hello world")

[1] "hello world"
